q: Google Inc( GOOG) wants to avoid a lengthy legal battle with European Union regulators investigating its market dominance, the Sunday Telegraph quoted its chief executive as saying. We certainly want to avoid that, Eric Schmidt told the paper in an interview. "I think it is in our interests and I would hope in their interests to a do a quick analysis of concerns that have been raised by competitors,

"Facebook is the world's biggest social network and Google Inc. is not going to come up with another social network," he said. But they already have a massive social presence. "YouTube is the third biggest website in the world and massively social... Email is still the primary social communication media and Google Inc. is the fastest growing email provider in the world. "And they've got the largest blogging platform in the world so they are already a massive player in social, he added. In a conference call with financial analysts after the surprise announcement that Page would replace Eric Schmidt in April, co-founder Sergey Brin indicated the company would be putting more effort into the social arena.
